constructor-arg.value: select * from T_SYS_AUDITLOG_HISTORY where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_SYS_AUDITLOG_HISTORY where 1=1

select * from T_SYS_AUDITLOG_HISTORY where
1=1
#if($uri) and URI=:uri #end
#if($parameters) and PARAMETERS=:parameters #end
#if($method) and METHOD=:method #end
#if($ip) and IP=:ip #end
#if($responseCode) and RESPONSE_CODE=:responseCode #end
#if($exception) and EXCEPTION=:exception #end
#if($operaterId) and OPERATER_ID=:operaterId #end

#if($archiveTime) and ARCHIVE_TIME >= :archiveTimeStart #end #if($archiveTime) and ARCHIVE_TIME <= :archiveTimeEnd #end

INSERT INTO t_sys_auditlog_history (id, archive_time, create_time, exception, ip , method, operater_id, parameters, response_code, uri) SELECT id, now(), create_time, exception, ip , method, operater_id, parameters, response_code, uri FROM t_sys_auditlog auditlog WHERE 1= 1 #if($createTimeStart) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeStart #end
